mapper.select: select * from product as p left join (select banneritem.id,banneritem.name as bannerItemName, banneritem.bannerId from banneritem ) b on p.bannerItemId= b.id left join (SELECT brand.brandCN as brandNameCN,brand.brandEN as brandNameEN,brand.id from brand) bb on p.brandId=bb.id where p.categoryId=#{categoryId};
select * from product where categoryId=#{categoryId} and state='1' ;
select * from product where categoryId=#{categoryId} and state='1' order by id desc;
select * from product where categoryId=#{categoryId} and state='1' order by price desc;
select * from product where categoryId=#{categoryId} and state='1' order by salesCount desc;
select * from product where name like CONCAT('%',#{KW},'%') and state ='1';
